channel.title: IPO Watch - Latest IPO Updates
channel.description: Track IPO GMP, allotment status, listing gains, and subscription data. India's most comprehensive IPO information platform.

item.title: Track Live IPO GMP Today
item.description: Check the latest Grey Market Premium (GMP) for all active and upcoming IPOs.

item.title: Mainboard IPO Listings
item.description: View all mainboard IPOs with subscription status, GMP, and listing performance.

item.title: SME IPO Listings
item.description: Track SME IPOs on NSE and BSE with detailed subscription and GMP data.

item.title: IPO Calendar 2025
item.description: Complete calendar of upcoming, open, and recently listed IPOs with key dates.

item.title: IPO Statistics & Analysis
item.description: Year-wise IPO performance statistics, sector analysis, and historical trends.
